snippet: The head of the Red Cross and Red Crescent on Tuesday said the deadly attacks on three of the organization’s workers this week were “profoundly shocking and unacceptable.”
abstract: Secretary General Elhadj As Sy, head of International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies, condemns recent attacks that killed an aid worker in Mali, another in Yemen and a third in Syria.
lead_paragraph: The head of the Red Cross and Red Crescent on Tuesday said the deadly attacks on three of the organization’s workers this week were “profoundly shocking and unacceptable.”

headline.main: Red Cross Federation Condemns Killings of Workers
headline.print_headline: Europe; Red Cross Federation Condemns Killings of Workers

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies
